summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 30th Ave. South from South Dawson Street to South Ferdinand Street; and certain other streets, avenues and easements; by constructing sanitary sewers and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 18358 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement by made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of installment notes.
